title: Do you own a Kia Seltos? The company is recalling some cars. Check details here
description: Kia India is recalling 4,358 petrol-powered Seltos SUVs due to a potential issue with the electronic oil pump controller. This could affect the performance of the automatic transmission.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
